name: RoboBlast2077
description:
Simple 2D sci-fi environment built to explore a procedurally generated cave. Mechanics are based loosely on the arcade classic Robotron 2084. Cave is generated using cellular automata and marching squares based on the algorithm described in the classic Sebastian Lague tutorial.

Built by Matthew Stevens of LLST.

Art:

  • Mech by CruzR: https://opengameart.org/content/mechs-64x64
  • Spider by Wciow and John.d.h: https://opengameart.org/content/mechs-64x64
  • Cave walls by Sindwiller: https://opengameart.org/content/dirty-concrete-floor-00
  • Cave floor by Tiziana: https://opengameart.org/content/even-grey-stone-tile-floor-256px
